scripts.dev: ecstatic ./static --port 9966 & chokidar 'src/*.elm' -c 'npm run build:client' & chokidar 'src/*.glsl' -c 'npm run build:shader'
scripts.build:shader: find ./src -name *.glsl | cut -d'/' -f3- | while read file; do mkdir -p "$(dirname "./static/$file")" && glslify ./src/$file > ./static/$file; done
